leaf_handlers: process individual leaf objects
[Net-SNMP Agent handler and extensibility API]

A group of handlers to implement individual leaf objects and instances (both scalar objects, and individual objects and instances within a table). More...

Detailed Description

A group of handlers to implement individual leaf objects and instances (both scalar objects, and individual objects and instances within a table).

These handlers will typically allow control to be passed down to a lower level, user-provided handler, but this is (usually) optional.

group   instance: process individual MIB instances easily.
group   scalar: process scalars easily.
group   scalar_group: process groups of scalars.
